title: Are there any videos that got reposted on YouTube for at least a 2nd time and got over 1 million views. How did they do it? - Quora

response.answer_text: There Are Many Videos On Youtube Which Posted Many Times And Also Got Millions Of Views. If You Search For a Song, You Will Get Many Results. Sometimes The Owner Himself Allow Others To Re-Upload His Videos, But Re-Uploader Will Not Get Any Revenue From It because The Content Will Become Copyrighted After Re-Upload.
